duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and manage the financial and operational facets of the community, including accounting, bookkeeping, and monthly financial reports.
Complete daily financial transactions, bank deposits, and reconcile bank accounts using property management software.
Review resident files and accounting records, communicate with residents regarding outstanding balances, and implement procedures for collecting on delinquencies.
Process invoices, obtain approvals, and manage communication between vendors, contractors, accounting, and the client/owner.
Follow established procedures related to evictions, represent the community in court hearings, and enforce the lease to maximize revenue.
Promote resident satisfaction and retention by addressing service issues and complaints in a timely manner.

Act as the on-site supervisor in the absence of the community manager, organizing and delegating daily work, coordinating maintenance tasks, and managing the operation of the community in compliance with company policies.
Assist in managing the client/owner relationship by meeting with the owners, providing updates, and responding to owner requests.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Property Management, Accounting, or related field (Master's preferred)
